underlying_goal: User wanted to add response caching to an experiment script to improve performance and adhere to project conventions.
primary_success: Implemented a robust, race-condition-free, async-compatible file-based caching mechanism for an uncached script, following project conventions and even self-correcting its own initial implementation after a code review.
brief_summary: The user asked to add caching to a script. Claude designed and implemented a file-based JSONL cache. During implementation, it performed a self-review, identified a race condition in its own code, and fixed it using a check-under-lock pattern before finalizing the implementation.
